verses.text: \w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

\w None|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w close|strong="H7126"\w* \w relative|strong="H7607"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* sexual relations. \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* dishonor \w your|strong="H3808"\w* father’s brother \w by|strong="H3808"\w* \w approaching|strong="H7126"\w* \w his|strong="H7126"\w* \w wife|strong="H1733"\w* \w to|strong="H1540"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* sexual relations \w with|strong="H1540"\w* \w her|strong="H1540"\w*; \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w your|strong="H3808"\w* \w aunt|strong="H1733"\w*.
